game.name: PAYDAY 2: The Bomb Heists
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bombs Away!The Bomb Heists DLC is the 15th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the first two heists from the new contact known as the Butcher. It's bombs away as you help the Butcher succeed with the heists Dockyard and Forest as a part of the Bomb job.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bombs Away!The Bomb Heists DLC is the 15th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the first two heists from the new contact known as the Butcher. It's bombs away as you help the Butcher succeed with the heists Dockyard and Forest as a part of the Bomb job.
game.developers: Lion game Lion, OVERKILL - a Starbreeze Studio.
